mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_IMAGE, INSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_IMAGE, '/', -1) +1) "rename" FROM ARTIST_GROUP WHERE ARTIST_GROUP_NO != 0 AND ARTIST_GROUP_IMAGE IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT SUBSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_PROFILE, INSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_PROFILE, '/', -1) +1) "rename" FROM ARTIST_GROUP WHERE ARTIST_GROUP_NO != 0 AND ARTIST_GROUP_PROFILE IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT SUBSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_BACKIMG, INSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_BACKIMG, '/', -1) +1) "rename" FROM ARTIST_GROUP WHERE ARTIST_GROUP_NO != 0 AND ARTIST_GROUP_BACKIMG IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT SUBSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_MAINIMG, INSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_MAINIMG, '/', -1) +1) "rename" FROM ARTIST_GROUP WHERE ARTIST_GROUP_NO != 0 AND ARTIST_GROUP_MAINIMG IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT SUBSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_LOGOIMG, INSTR(ARTIST_GROUP_LOGOIMG, '/', -1) +1) "rename" FROM ARTIST_GROUP WHERE ARTIST_GROUP_NO != 0 AND ARTIST_GROUP_LOGOIMG IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT SUBSTR(ARTIST_PROFILE, INSTR(ARTIST_PROFILE, '/', -1) +1) "rename" FROM ARTIST WHERE MEMBER_NO != 0 AND ARTIST_PROFILE IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT PRODUCT_IMAGE_RENAME "rename" FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE WHERE PRODUCT_IMAGE_NO != 0 AND PRODUCT_IMAGE_RENAME IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT PRODUCT_IMAGE_THUMBNAIL_RENAME "rename" FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE WHERE PRODUCT_IMAGE_NO != 0 AND PRODUCT_IMAGE_THUMBNAIL_RENAME IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT SUBSTR(MEMBER_PROFILE , INSTR(MEMBER_PROFILE, '/', -1) +1) "rename" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO != 0 AND MEMBER_PROFILE IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT BOARD_IMAGE_RENAME "rename" FROM BOARD_IMAGE WHERE IMG_NO != 0
